statements: UPDATE SustainableFashionCollection SET description='New collection description', price=99.99 WHERE collection_id=1;
UPDATE SustainableFashionCollection SET designer_name='New Designer', collection_name='Spring Collection', release_date='2023-04-15' WHERE collection_id=2;
UPDATE SustainableFashionCollection SET price = 2000.00, description = 'New summer collection' WHERE collection_id = 1
UPDATE SustainableFashionCollection SET release_date = '2022-09-15', price = 1500.00, designer_name = 'Jane Doe' WHERE collection_id = 2
UPDATE fashion_collections SET collection_name = 'Winter Collection', start_date = '2022-11-01' WHERE collection_id = 'e61e568f-8f5e-4bb1-ba7f-38f8b578b63e';
UPDATE fashion_products SET quantity = 100, price = 49.99 WHERE product_id = '3f527120-1a67-4617-bdc4-2af3e158fbf9';
UPDATE fashion_collections SET collection_name = 'Autumn Collection', start_date = '2023-09-01' WHERE collection_id = '60129f2e-c76b-4d8a-b3d1-8e4c87ce1be6';

UPDATE fashion_collections SET designer='New Designer' WHERE collection_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=99.99 WHERE product_id=2;
UPDATE fashion_collections SET designer = 'New Designer', release_date = '2023-06-15' WHERE collection_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 99.99, category = 'Winter Wear' WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE fashion_brands SET brand_name = 'Gucci' WHERE brand_id = 'f017b95c-4fd2-4db9-82e2-298c40f3f63f';
UPDATE fashion_products SET price = 899.99, product_name = 'Leather Bag' WHERE product_id = '1f0ab8f0-875a-49f9-b626-6b0805b5d67a';
UPDATE fashion_brands SET rating = 4.5 WHERE brand_name = 'Gucci';
UPDATE fashion_collections SET release_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE collection_title = 'Spring 2022';
UPDATE product SET price = 15.99 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE brand SET is_ecofriendly = TRUE, headquarters = 'Los Angeles' WHERE id = 201;
UPDATE product SET price = 49.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE id = 12345;
UPDATE customer SET email = 'newemail@example.com', address = '123 Main St' WHERE id = 98765;
